title: Turncoat
description:
An Israeli Defense solider decides to speak out about his violent actions from the past and they come back to haunt him.

Season 10 Episode 26
itunes:title: Turncoat
itunes:subtitle: When Dean Issacharoff was a commander in the Israeli Defense Forces, he patrolled the Palestinian city of Hebron, and later fought in Gaza. Then, after he got home from the army, Dean’s decision to speak out about his own violent actions came back to haun
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
itunes:author: Snap Judgment and PRX

An Israeli Defense solider decides to speak out about his violent actions from the past and they come back to haunt him.
